search_results.snippet: Cogito ergo sum. Cogito ergo sum [a] is a Latin philosophical proposition by Ren Descartes usually translated into English as "I think, therefore I am". The phrase originally appeared in French as je pense, donc je suis in his Discourse on the Method, so as to reach a wider audience than Latin would have allowed.
